mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(order_id, customer_id, price, status, description) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{customer_id}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description})
INSERT INTO order_infos(order_itemid, order_infoid, product_id, patient_infoid) VALUES (#{order_itemid}, #{order_infoid}, #{product_id}, #{patient_infoid})

INSERT INTO order_events(order_eventid, order_id, event_time, event_title, event_executor, description) VALUES (#{order_eventid}, #{order_id}, #{event_time}, #{event_title}, #{event_executor}, #{description})
INSERT INTO order_items(order_id, order_itemid, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{order_itemid}, #{product_id}, #{quantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT orders.order_id, orders.price, orders.status, orders.description, products.product_name, order_items.order_itemid, order_items.product_id, order_items.quantity, oi.order_infoid FROM orders, order_items, order_infos AS oi, products WHERE orders.order_id = #{orderId} AND orders.order_id = order_items.order_id AND order_items.order_itemid = oi.order_itemid AND order_items.product_id = oi.product_id AND products.product_id = oi.product_id

SELECT orders.row_id, orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, orders.price, orders.status, orders.description, order_items.order_itemid, order_items.product_id, order_items.quantity, products.product_name FROM orders, order_items, products WHERE customer_id = #{customer_id} AND orders.order_id = order_items.order_id AND products.product_id = order_items.product_id ORDER BY row_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT order_events.order_eventid, order_events.order_id, order_events.event_title, order_events.event_time FROM orders, order_events WHERE orders.status = 'CREATION' AND orders.customer_id = #{customer_id} AND order_events.order_id = orders.order_id AND now() - INTERVAL '15 minutes' > order_events.event_time

SELECT orders.row_id, orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, orders.price, orders.status, orders.description, order_items.order_itemid, order_items.product_id, order_items.quantity, products.product_name FROM orders, order_items, products WHERE customer_id = #{customer_id} AND orders.order_id = order_items.order_id AND products.product_id = order_items.product_id AND status = #{status} ORDER BY row_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
